entry.title: 木头姐（Cathie Wood）的 Ark Invest 增持了 Coinbase（COIN）的 78，982 股股票，以周五收盘价 40.24 美元计算，花费约 300 万美元。近几个月来，该股一直低迷...
entry.summary: 木头姐（Cathie Wood）的 Ark Invest 增持了 Coinbase（COIN）的 78，982 股股票，以周五收盘价 40.24 美元计算，花费约 300 万美元。近几个月来，该股一直低迷，比 8 月初下跌了近 60%。此次收购后，ARK Innovation ETF (ARKK) 持有 COIN 股票达到 570 万股，风险敞口增加了 1.4%。

entry.summary: 吴说获悉，0xPlasma Labs 在 Uniswap 社区发起新提案，建议在 BNB Chain 上部署Uniswap V3。并表示，BNB Chain 有庞大且不断增长的用户群和高交易速度低费率等优势， Uniswap v3 可借此扩大在 DeFi 的影响力。该提案正在讨论阶段。 https://gov.uniswap.org/t/deploy-uniswap-v3-1-0-3-0-05-0-01-to-bnb-chain-binance/19734

entry.title: Re We have other products in the roadmap as well, but are open to feature requests from people interested as we build out the tool in front of you all...
entry.summary: Re We have other products in the roadmap as well, but are open to feature requests from people interested as we build out the tool in front of you all. We will eventually launch a page for these feature requests to be submitted, but you can always DM me or email me with ideas.

entry.title: Re We are also developing better wallet labels, including "time based” labels for how long a sharp trader typically holds their investment, so you ha...
entry.summary: Re We are also developing better wallet labels, including "time based” labels for how long a sharp trader typically holds their investment, so you have a better sense of if it is a longer term conviction trader or more of a rotatoor.

entry.title: Re Longer term, we will be building out similar functions but for all wallets (so you can see token movements across any coin, any wallet). We also ha...
entry.summary: Re Longer term, we will be building out similar functions but for all wallets (so you can see token movements across any coin, any wallet). We also have a charting feature in the works to show when and at what price any wallet has bought or sold a token.

entry.title: Re We also have some cool features being built for more of a “premium” package, including popular contract interactions from our sharp traders, new ...
entry.summary: Re We also have some cool features being built for more of a “premium” package, including popular contract interactions from our sharp traders, new token launches they are aping into, and Hot Hands, which will show token movements for the best performing P&L traders on a 30D basis

entry.title: Re Sharp Trader Ownership: When you drill down into a token, you will be able to see smart money balances over time, along with the token’s price, to...
entry.summary: Re Sharp Trader Ownership: When you drill down into a token, you will be able to see smart money balances over time, along with the token’s price, to get a sense of (1) if sharp money is accumulating but also (2) price levels where they typically buy or sell their holdings

entry.title: Re Analytics: This will include perp positioning (long/short), stablecoin holdings percentages, ETH holding percentages and alt token holding percenta...
entry.summary: Re Analytics: This will include perp positioning (long/short), stablecoin holdings percentages, ETH holding percentages and alt token holding percentages. This will help give a barometer of risk appetite in the market along with trader skew (long or short)

entry.title: Re Wallet alerts: Which will give you the ability to set up customized alerts to telegram, email or discord on any wallet’s movements
entry.summary: Re Wallet alerts: Which will give you the ability to set up customized alerts to telegram, email or discord on any wallet’s movements

entry.title: Re Roadmap / Features: As mentioned, this dashboard is just for the public beta launch, and we will have many incremental features when we formally la...
entry.summary: Re Roadmap / Features: As mentioned, this dashboard is just for the public beta launch, and we will have many incremental features when we formally launch next month. Some of these features for our base package will include:

entry.title: Re Eventually you will be able to search any wallet and get this dashboard, so you can check on recent token movements in a quick and easy way.
entry.summary: Re Eventually you will be able to search any wallet and get this dashboard, so you can check on recent token movements in a quick and easy way.

entry.title: Re One of my favorite features in the dashboard is that you can drill down to the wallet level to see what their movements are. This is a much more op...
entry.summary: Re One of my favorite features in the dashboard is that you can drill down to the wallet level to see what their movements are. This is a much more optimal way to look at historical wallet movements than Debank, as everything is consolidated in a much easier to read way.

entry.title: Re We are also still in process of providing smart money balances over time for any token, which will include the token’s price on the chart.
entry.summary: Re We are also still in process of providing smart money balances over time for any token, which will include the token’s price on the chart.

entry.title: Re From there, you can take another step deeper, and look at the underlying wallets making up our sharp trader movements, to follow which specific sha...
entry.summary: Re From there, you can take another step deeper, and look at the underlying wallets making up our sharp trader movements, to follow which specific sharp traders are making moves in any given token.
